title: How to write about yourself in 500 words - Quora

response.answer_text: A 500 word autobiography would be about 10 fifty-word paragraphs. There is no hard rule about where to start, but to make it interesting, Write three or four paragraphs about what you are currently involved in: Where you live, what you do for a living, how you spend your time. In the next three paragraphs, tell where you were born and how it was like growing up. In the last three paragraphs, write about things you would like to do for the rest of your life.
